info.title: MaiaRental
info.description:
This a simple API of rental Car that intended to fulfill an assignment test of Maia Raya Junior Developer.

This API include function,
1. Authentication Using JWT
2. Administration (Simple CRUD to record car entity)
3. Rental (Simple Create and Read to record Rental history)

post.description: Endpoint for login to get JWT auth Token (for admin and rental user)

get.description: Endpoint to get detail information of a selected car (this is for admin only)
Endpoint to get list of all car (this is for admin only)

post.description:
Endpoint to register new type of Car. You can register a car with unique merk, tipe, and kondisi

example : 

// can be inserted : 

Mercedes - S Class - Bagus - Jumlah 10

Mercedes - S Class - Lumayan - Jumlah 10

// cannot be inserted (duplicated) :

Mercedes - S Class - Bagus - Jumlah 10

Mercedes - S Class - Bagus - Jumlah 10

example.message: Mobil dengan merk , tipe, dan kondisi tersebut sudah pernah di input

get.description: Endpoint for getting list of all car (for user)
Endpoint for getting detail information of a car (for user)

post.description: Endpoint for checking availability of a car to be rented in selected date
Endpoint for renting a Car in selected date

example.message: Mobil dengan merk , tipe, dan kondisi tersebut sudah pernah di input

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: This is an Authentication endpoint, it consist endpoint login for admin and user, and endpoint signup to register new user ( user for renting the car not Admin)
